text: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery is an upcoming American mystery movie. It is expected to be released sometime in late 2025. It was directed by Rian Johnson. He also wrote and co-produced it with Ram Bergman and Katie McNeill. It is the third movie in the Knives Out series and is sequel to the 2022 movie Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery. Like the last movie, Wake Up Dead Man shares its name with the song "Wake Up Dead Man" by the Irish rock band U2. Principle photography for the movie started on June 10, 2024 in London and finished on August 17. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s black comedy movies Category:2020s crime thriller movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies directed by Rian Johnson Category:Mystery thriller movies Category:Nonlinear narrative movies Category:Netflix movies Category:Upcoming sequel movies Category:Upcoming movies
title: Wake Up Dead Man
